      public static double haversineDistance(TripPoint a, TripPoint b)
      Returns the haversineDistance between TripPoints a and b. The haversine distance is in kilometers.
      Parameters:
      a -
      b -
      Returns:

    • totalDistance

      public static double totalDistance()
      Returns the total by calculating the haversine distance between each pair of adjacent TripPoints in the trip array, then adding them up. totalDistance is in kilometers.
      Returns:
      totalDistance
